meaningMnemonic: You're <kanji>discerning</kanji> about what you <kanji>know</kanji>. You choose what to keep and what not to keep in your brain. This is the sum of your <vocabulary>knowledge</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
